thread.title: Foreign sailor killed by cracked pipe hot water in ship at Chittagong Port
thread.title_full: Foreign sailor killed by cracked pipe hot water in ship at Chittagong Port

title: Foreign sailor killed by cracked pipe hot water in ship at Chittagong Port
text:
Foreign sailor killed by cracked pipe hot water in ship at Chittagong Port Chittagong Bureau, bdnews24.com  18:10.0  30:18.0 BdST A foreign sailor has been killed by hot water splashed from a cracked engine pipe of a ship docked at Chittagong Port's outer anchorage, police say. 
His name has been written as 'Basil Kairil' from Ukraine on Chittagong Medical College Hospital's register. The incident occurred at MV Camilla's engine room around 3pm on Wednesday. The doctors at the hospital declared him dead when he was brought at 4:30pm, said the hospital police camp Inspector Zahirul Islam.
